pages.text: The Storage Racks mod, included with MineColonies, provides a versatile and compact storage solution. $(br2)These racks offer an efficient way to organize your items with adjustable shelves and easy access.
Craft a Storage Rack using wood and iron ingots. $(br2)Each rack can hold multiple items and be customized to your storage needs.
Even if you're not using MineColonies, Storage Racks are a handy way to keep your storage organized and accessible. $(br2)Combine them with other storage mods for the ultimate organization system!
